Song.title: This Is Amazing Grace
Song.copyright: Jeremy Riddle | Josh Farro | Phil Wickham Â© 2012 Phil Wickham Music, Seems Like Music, Sing My Songs, WB Music Corp., Bethel Music Publishing

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A] Who breaks the power of sin and darkness [D2(no3)] Whose love is mighty and so much stronger [F#m] The King of Glory [E] the King above all k[A]ings
Verse 2: [A] Who shakes the whole earth with holy thunder [D2(no3)] Who leaves us breathless in awe and wonder [F#m] The King of Glory [E] the King above all k[A]ings
Chorus: This is amazing g[A]race This is unfailing l[D]ove That You would take my p[F#m]lace That You would bear my c[E]ross You laid down Your l[A]ife That I would be set f[D]ree Oh[F#m] Jesus I sing for [E] all that You've done for [A]me
Inter: [| A | | D2(no3) | | ]
Verse 3: [A] Who brings our chaos back into order [D2(no3)] Who makes the orphan a son and daughter [F#m] The King of Glory [E] the King above all k[A]ings
Verse 4: [A] Who rules the nations with truth and justice [D2(no3)] Shines like the sun in all of its brilliance [F#m] The King of Glory [E] the King above all k[A]ings
{new_page} Bridge: [A]Worthy is the Lamb who was slain [D2(no3)] Worthy is the King who conquered the grave [A]Worthy is the Lamb who was slain [D2(no3)] Worthy is the King who conquered the grave [A]Worthy is the Lamb who was slain [D2(no3)] Worthy is the King who conquered the grave [F#m]Worthy is the Lamb who was s[A]lain Worthy [D2(no3)]worthy worthy
Alt Bridge: What other king leaves his [A]throne What other king leaves his [D]throne What other king leaves his g[A]lory What other king leaves his g[D]lory to die, his glory to die
Chorus: This is amazing g[A]race This is unfailing l[D]ove That You would take my p[F#m]lace That You would bear my c[E]ross You laid down Your l[A]ife That I would be set f[D]ree Oh[F#m] Jesus I sing for [E] all that You've done for [A]me
Ending: [| A | | D2(no3) | | A | | D2(no3) | |]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 who breaks the power of sin and darkness whose love is mighty and so much stronger the king of glory the king above all kings verse 2 who shakes the whole earth with holy thunder who leaves us breathless in awe and wonder the king of glory the king above all kings chorus this is amazing grace this is unfailing love that you would take my place that you would bear my cross you laid down your life that i would be set free oh jesus i sing for all that youve done for me inter verse 3 who brings our chaos back into order who makes the orphan a son and daughter the king of glory the king above all kings verse 4 who rules the nations with truth and justice shines like the sun in all of its brilliance the king of glory the king above all kings bridge worthy is the lamb who was slain worthy is the king who conquered the grave worthy is the lamb who was slain worthy is the king who conquered the grave worthy is the lamb who was slain worthy is the king who conquered the grave worthy is the lamb who was slain worthy worthy worthy alt bridge what other king leaves his throne what other king leaves his throne what other king leaves his glory what other king leaves his glory to die his glory to die chorus this is amazing grace this is unfailing love that you would take my place that you would bear my cross you laid down your life that i would be set free oh jesus i sing for all that youve done for me ending
